intro.name: Joel McCandless
intro.subtitle: CS Masters & CS/Computer Engineering Bachelors at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute
intro.about: Hi, I am a CS Masters student studying the computation behind intelligent behavior, including methods of Machine Learning, Computer Vision, and Control Systems. I enjoy taking a multidisciplinary approach to solve complex problems, pursuing ambitious goals to address modern needs.
intro.mission: I will nurture a boundless curiosity by embracing the joy of exploration and discovery. I will cultivate both breadth and depth of knowledge, uniting diverse fields in creative and meaningful ways. I will hold myself to a high standard that fosters self-respect and pride in my achievements. With gratitude for life, I will build genuine friendships and grow together with those around me.

gallery.title: Academics
gallery.description: Building a strong academic foundation through rigorous coursework and deep learning, developing the knowledge and critical thinking skills needed to tackle complex real-world challenges and make a meaningful impact.

gallery.title: Neural Network Verification
gallery.description: Researching the verifiability of neural networks in control systems using Verisig, a formal verification tool, to ensure safety and reliability of AI-driven control systems in critical applications.

gallery.title: Shubble
gallery.description: Developing a comprehensive shuttle tracking and resource allocation system for the RPI campus with the Rensselaer Center for Open Source, providing real-time shuttle locations and optimized route planning.

gallery.title: RPI Men's Tennis
gallery.description: Competing as a member of the Division III tennis team, defending champions and ranked #9 nationally, representing RPI in competitive collegiate athletics with dedication and team spirit.

gallery.title: RPISEC
gallery.description: Serving as Secretary of the RPI cybersecurity club, participating in CTF competitions, conferences, and workshops to advance security skills and contribute to the cybersecurity community.

gallery.title: McCandless Consulting
gallery.description: Leading a consulting firm that applies software and IT solutions to modernize systems, specializing in real-time tracking and optimization to help organizations operate more efficiently.

quotes_intro: I'm drawn to the simple wisdom that shines through well-chosen words.
